Interface CommentDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
CommentDAOPostgres
public interface CommentDAO
Interface for Data Access Object (DAO) operations related to the Comment entity. Provides methods for creating, updating, deleting, and retrieving comments on posts and photos.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    createComment(Comment comment)
    Creates a new comment.
    boolean
    deleteComment(int commentId)
    Deletes a comment by its ID.

    getCommentReplies(int commentId)
    Retrieves replies to a comment.

    Retrieves comments on a post.

  • Method Details

    • getPostComments

      List<Comment> getPostComments(int postId)
      Retrieves comments on a post.
      Parameters:
      postId - The ID of the post to retrieve comments for.
      Returns:
      A list of Comment objects containing the comments on the post.

    • getPhotoComments

      List<Comment> getPhotoComments(int photoId)
      Retrieves comments on a photo.
      Parameters:
      photoId - The ID of the photo to retrieve comments for.
      Returns:
      A list of Comment objects containing the comments on the photo.

    • getCommentReplies

      List<Comment> getCommentReplies(int commentId)
      Retrieves replies to a comment.
      Parameters:
      commentId - The ID of the comment to retrieve replies for.
      Returns:
      A list of Comment objects containing the replies to the comment.

    • createComment

      boolean createComment(Comment comment)
      Creates a new comment.
      Parameters:
      comment - The Comment object containing the comment details.
      Returns:
      true if the comment was created successfully, false otherwise.

    • updateComment

      boolean updateComment(Comment comment)
      Updates an existing comment.
      Parameters:
      comment - The Comment object containing the updated comment details.
      Returns:
      true if the comment was updated successfully, false otherwise.

    • deleteComment

      boolean deleteComment(int commentId)
      Deletes a comment by its ID.
      Parameters:
      commentId - The ID of the comment to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the comment was deleted successfully, false otherwise.
